meanings: Noun (드레스외투 등의 허리 아랫부분을 가리키는) 옷자락[치맛자락]

vlive.korean: 가죽 스커트입니다. I'm wearing a leather skirt. 듣기 View video fromis_9 : 토요일 안녕😶👋
그리고 지수 씨 착장의 하의는 체커보드 스커트였죠. And Jisoo's bottoms were a checkerboard skirt. 듣기 View video Fairy Tina : BLACKPINK - DDU DU DDU DU 커버 댄스&스타일링 with 민스코 | FAIRY TINA 페어리 티나
vlive.english: And Jisoo's bottoms were a checkerboard skirt.

vlive.korean: [클럽 룩(?) 반팔 티 + 블링 블링 스커트] 이건가? [A club look(?). Short sleeve shirt + blinging skirt] Is this it? 듣기 View video M2 : PREMIERE SHOWCASE : CLC
vlive.english: [A club look(?). Short sleeve shirt + blinging skirt] Is this it?

vlive.korean: 하나가 바로 퍼고요 하나가 바로 랩스커트인데요, 랩원피스! One was the fur and the other was the wrap skirts. The wrap dresses! 듣기 View video V Beauty : [Yeonsun 연선] 서울패션위크 랭앤루 변혜정&박민선 디자이너 패션쇼 라이브 Seoul Fashion Week Lang&Lu Show
vlive.english: One was the fur and the other was the wrap skirts. The wrap dresses!

vlive.korean: 모자, 스커트, 아우터 등 호피 아이템으로 스타일링을 해봤어요. Hat, skirt, outerwear, etc., I tried styling with leopard print clothing. 듣기 View video EUNBI : EUNBI✟How to Wear Animal Print | Leopard Print Outfit Ideas 레오파드! 호피무늬 아이템 코디 방법
vlive.english: Hat, skirt, outerwear, etc., I tried styling with leopard print clothing.
